data.name: Midnight Blues Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo contains the first 3 levels of Midnight Blues for you to try out. Give it a shot! And give Vincent's targets multiple shots...
data.about_the_game: This demo contains the first 3 levels of Midnight Blues for you to try out. Give it a shot! And give Vincent's targets multiple shots...
data.short_description: This demo contains the first 3 levels of Midnight Blues for you to try out. Give it a shot! And give Vincent's targets multiple shots...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
